import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch , useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' const ProductScreen = ({history, match }) => { const [qty,setQty] = setState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading , error , product} = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch,match]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( <> Go Back {loading ? : error ?

{error}

: (
{product.name}
 {product.description} Benefits: {product.Materials} Price: ${product.price} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
